mapper.select:
select
from t_paymentvendormgt a where a.t_Pymt_ID = #{t_Pymt_ID,jdbcType=VARCHAR} order by a.create_time

select
from t_paymentvendormgt a where a.t_Pymt_Name = #{t_Pymt_Name,jdbcType=VARCHAR} for update

select
from t_paymentvendormgt a where
a.t_Pymt_Name like CONCAT('%',#{t_Pymt_Name},'%')
and a.t_Pymt_API like CONCAT('%',#{t_Pymt_API},'%')
and a.t_Pymt_Status like CONCAT('%',#{t_Pymt_Status},'%')
and a.remark like CONCAT('%',#{remark},'%')
order by a.create_time

mapper.update:
update t_paymentvendormgt

where t_TreasuryDB_OrgName = #{t_TreasuryDB_OrgName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
